ðŸ“– Summary: Dufs is a utility file server written in Rust that allows users to easily serve files over HTTP. It supports a variety of features including static file serving, file uploading via drag and drop, folder downloads as zip files, access control, HTTPS, and WebDAV. It can be used to quickly share files, create simple web interfaces for file management, or serve as a basic WebDAV server.
